title: Vector vs Scalar

children.value: Which of the following pairs contains one vector quantity and one scalar quantity?

answer.value: The correct answer is (b). Displacement, acceleration, force, momentum and velocity are all vector quantities. Kinetic Energy, power, speed, work and potential energy are all scalar quantities.
